questions.question: How do you play Brain Rush?
How do you create questions in Brain Rush?
How does a player join a game in Brain Rush?
How is scoring done in Brain Rush?
What devices are compatible with Brain Rush?
Can Brain Rush be played in multiple languages?
What types of questions can be created in Brain Rush?
How do you share a Brain Rush game with others?

answers.answer: Brain Rush is an educational game similar to Kahoot where players answer questions to earn points.
To play Brain Rush, the host creates a game and shares the code with players, who join and answer questions in real-time.
Questions in Brain Rush are created through the host's dashboard, where they can add, edit, and organize questions.
A player joins a Brain Rush game by entering the game code on the playerâ€™s login page.
In Brain Rush, points are awarded based on the speed and accuracy of the players' answers.
Brain Rush is compatible with any device that has a web browser, including computers, tablets, and smartphones.
Yes, Brain Rush offers a free version with basic features, as well as subscription options for additional features.
Yes, Brain Rush supports multiple languages, allowing players to play in their preferred language.
In Brain Rush, you can create multiple-choice, true/false, and short answer questions.
To share a Brain Rush game, the host can provide the game code or send a direct link to the participants.
